name: price_probability
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool marketci_analytics.
Tool description: Stock Market Endpoint for Price Forecasts, Probability, Cash Flow Models , and Peer Comps 
API description: Based on over 1000 forecasts, the probabilistic outcome is above or below the current price in a normal distribution.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which the probabilistic outcome is to be fetched.
